item.title: By: Peter Presnell
item.dc:creator: Peter Presnell
item.description: <p>Hey Matt. I hope you do realize Vegas is not exactly taking the direct flight home? As I am sure you found out 3am is considered the early part of the evening in Vegas. Hope you have a great time there. It was great to catch up with you.</p>
item.content:encoded: Hey Matt. I hope you do realize Vegas is not exactly taking the direct flight home? As I am sure you found out 3am is considered the early part of the evening in Vegas. Hope you have a great time there. It was great to catch up with you.
